Class ConsoleConditionChecker

All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, IConditionChecker
public class ConsoleConditionChecker
extends java.lang.Object
implements IConditionChecker, java.io.Serializable

Condition checker class that writes an error to the console when one occurs
